title: #Backplane.v0_1_0.Backplane

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

ComputerSystems.description: This is a link to a collection of ComputerSystems hosted on the Baseboards connected to this Backplane.
ComputerSystems.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the ComputerSystem schema.

PCIeDevices.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeDevices hosted on the Baseboards connected to this Backplane.
PCIeDevices.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeDevice schema.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

Baseboards.description: This is a link to a collection of Baseboards this Backplane is connected to.
Baseboards.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Baseboard schema.

PCIeSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeSwitches hosted on this Backplane.
PCIeSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeSwitch schema.

Chassis.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the Chassis schema.

Backplane.description: This is the schema definition for the Backplane resource.
Backplane.longDescription: This is the schema definition for the Backplane resource. It represents the properties of a Backplane.

enumDescriptions.Ethernet: This Backplane provides the infrastructure for ethernet communication.
enumDescriptions.PCIe: This Backplane provides the infrastructure for PCIe communication.
